## Air
- [Manchester-Boston Regional Airport](https://www.flymanchester.com/)
- [Boston Logan International Airport](https://www.massport.com/logan-airport/)

## Ground
- [Dartmouth Coach](https://dartmouthcoach.com/) from Boston or NYC to Dartmouth college or White River Junction
- [Amtrak](https://www.amtrak.com/) to White River Junction

We can help coordinate a ride for you from White River Junction to the wedding venue if needed.
Please add the time of your arrival to this [Carpool sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1c_IF5f0gY2EpwDWvSkv1FamWb_bG4eqKfgozGD8xTK8/edit?usp=sharing).

## Carpool requests
Offer/find your ride to the [Upper Valley](http://matinic.us/defining-uv/#view) by adding your name to this [Carpool sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1c_IF5f0gY2EpwDWvSkv1FamWb_bG4eqKfgozGD8xTK8/edit?usp=sharing).
